lines.text: create characters i1 , i2 , l1 , l2
read i1 read i2 read l1 read l2
print maximum of absolute value of i1 - l1 and absolute value of i2 - l2 , print newline
lines.code: cout << max ( abs ( i1 - l1 ) , abs ( i2 - l2 ) ) << endl ;

lines.text: while i1 is not l1 or i2 is not l2
if i1 is less than l1
if i1 is greater than l1
if i2 is greater than l2
if i2 is less than l2

errors.err_msg: ‘l2’ was not declared in this scope
‘n’ was not declared in this scope
